attributes.action: stop the sale of alcoholic beverages outside the confines of licensed drinking and entertainment establishments and set up a system of Liquor Stores, as in the continental USA and Canada, where only properly trained Customs and Excise Officers may sell such beverages to the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the same time the government should levy a small returnable deposit on all glass, plastic and metal containers of alcoholic beverages to encourage the return of those items to the Liquor Store.  Anybody who has been to Canada will know that beer cans or other bottles and plastic containers are not seen on the streets - all the kids take them back to the Liquor Store to get money to buy their supplies of 'weed'!
